divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my balcony on the 4th of July, I noticed a triangle shapedobject in the eastern sky.I thought it was a jet. It was silver in color and hadround marking on it. Then I noticed about 10 or so round black balls trailingthe object. They seemed to be trying to catch up with the object. When theycaught up with the triangle, they made a round circle around the triangle.Thetriangle and the black balls circleing it continued to fly to the north untilthey faded away into the horizon.I was intrested in the black balls as I hadseen just one black ball a couple of years before, which was much closer andlarger and besides changing directions it also hovered, then went straight uptill it was just a pin point then faded away.it was quite a emotional experienceand almost religious feeling.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Fargo
There were no other sightings in Fargo on or around July 4th 2000
Summary: Saw Triangle with black balls behind it
